alert.note: Alert for Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 02 at 11:31AM MST until December 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Teton and Gros Ventre Mountains. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel over Teton Pass and Togwotee Pass will be impacted by the combination of snow and wind. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow is expected to fall in the Teton Range where totals over 30 inches are possible. There will be a relative lull in the snowfall late tonight and Sunday morning. For forecast snowfall images and avalanche weather information, go to weather.gov/riverton/avalancheweather.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
